name: Fischl
storytext:
"Oz, mine familiar, spread thine wings and weave for me a new fate in the gloom of this night!"
"Mein Fr√§ulein, you cannot expect me to fetch you a replacement card..."
source: Reward for inviting Fischl to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K5]</color> to all opposing characters on standby.
